org.eclipse.scada.configuration.security.impl

Class SignatureRuleImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • EObjectImpl
      • org.eclipse.scada.configuration.security.impl.RuleImpl
        • org.eclipse.scada.configuration.security.impl.SignatureRuleImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rule, SignatureRule

    public class SignatureRuleImpl
extends RuleImpl
implements SignatureRule
    An implementation of the model object 'Signature Rule'.

    The following features are implemented:

    • Trusted Certification Authority
    • Indent Xml
    • Post Processor
    • Reload Period
